thread.section_title: POP Yachts Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of POP Yachts | popyachts.com
thread.title: Peter Montgomery
thread.title_full: POP Yachts reviewed by Peter Montgomery

author: Peter Montgomery
title: Peter Montgomery
text: The staff at POP Yachts were fantastic. Even though I took a year to find the right boat they never gave up. They were always polite and once we found the right boat they did everything to make the sale go smoothly. Thank you everyone for great service. I can't wait to get out and sail my new boat.
